title: ðŸš¨Panthers to replace Cam Newton with Teddy Bridgewater, Philip Rivers to the Colts (Football 3/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the Panthers evolving quarterback carousel as Cam Newton is on the outs with Carolina (4:00), while Teddy Bridgewater is reportedly on his way in to replace the former league MVP (22:00). The Pick Six Superfriends also discuss Philip Rivers finalizing a deal with the Colts (30:00) and what the move means for Indy and the remainder of the QB market.
*NOTE: This podcast was recorded before terms of Rivers' deal were released.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
